name: Kitsune Spell Expertise
summary: Your tails show your magical mastery.
description:
Your tails show your magical mastery. During your daily preparations, choose confusion, death ward, or illusory scene. You can Cast this Spell as a 5th-level divine innate spell once that day. You become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls.Traits

Kitsune: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.
